result.eng: He looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ga: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.orig: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.html: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach airHe looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé orm agus dreaċ brónaċ airHe looked at me with a sad expression.

result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.orig: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.html: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga ḃí dreaċ sollúnta orṫuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.

result.eng: A large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ga: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.orig: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.html: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidhA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí slua mór daoine bailiṫe timpeall an tí agus dreaċ an ḃróin ar a n-aġaiḋA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.orig: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.html: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadhIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé soiléir óna dreaċ go raiḃ sí tar éis a ḃeiṫ ag caoineaḋIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.

result.ga: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na máthar
result.orig: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na máthar
result.html: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na mátharMother started looking worried.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig dreaċ imníoċ ar aġaiḋ na máṫarMother started looking worried.

result.eng: The hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ga: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibheThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dreaċ dorċa uaigneaċ ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.

result.eng: The black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.
result.ga: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainne
result.orig: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainne
result.html: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainneThe black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dreaċ gruama dorċa ar an ḟarraige ag na néalta duḃa fearṫainneThe black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.

result.eng: I'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.
result.ga: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaim
result.orig: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaim
result.html: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaimI'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé tuirseaċ den áit agus tá malairt dreaċ tíre ag teastáil uaimI'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.
